game.title: The Lost Sword
game.description: The legendary sword that was lost a hundred years ago has reappeared. The quest giver has requested you to find and retrieve this lost artifact.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a special item

task.description: Go to the old ruins and look for clues about the lost sword.
task.location: Old Ruins, North of the town

task.description: Defeat the guardian of the legendary sword in the dark dungeon.
task.location: Dark Dungeon, Beneath the old ruins

task.description: Find and retrieve the legendary sword after defeating the guardian.
